page.title: 16CUBS & SCOUTS IN SEDGEFIELD
page.content: There are four packs in Sedgefield two cub packs and two scout packs . The cub packs are run on Tuesday and Thursday .The cub leaders are {AKELA,BALOO,BARGHEERA}and{KAA. The scout pack meets at the scout hut at West End.They meet on Friday and Wednesdays. There are two main camps which we go on.These are Whit camp for two days and Summer camp for a week. In 1984 the German scouts came from Hamminkeln and camped on the Race Course.Hamminkeln is Sedgefield's twin town.In Friday pack we have four patrol corners Hawks,Ravens, Eagles ,Falcons. In Wednesday pack we have three patrol corners Kestrels,Owls, Swifts. Every so often we go out on an out door meeting.We cook our own food on a fire that your patrol makes.
